title: Here be Dragons
abstract: Documentation of the design and making of two dancing dragon installation on the Perfume River for the Hue biennial cultural festival. Australian artists Jennifer Jones & Phillip Nizette and Vietnamese art students worked together to meet the tight schedule, not without challenges and surprises.
credits: Cinematography by Jennifer Jones, Phillip Nizette & Paul Zetter
awards: Best Documentary FNI(A) Award, Film Networking Industry Australia 2007
